Question.Subject: millsberry - where can i buy a shelf?
Question.Content: on millsberry.com i cannot find a shelf. im looking for a shelf for books. a bookshelf. can anyone tell me where i can buy one?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
There are both open shelves that are short and long and come in a variety of colors located at the Furniture Store. You can put whatever you want on these shelves.
If you have a shelf already with books, there is such an item located on page 6 of the Furniture Store.
If you want to have a resource that lists ALL the items in EVERY store located on Millsberry, come check out millsberryfriends08.forumotion.com !!!

Go to Amazon, you can get anything what you want: http://www.amazon.com/gp/redirect.html?ie=UTF8&location=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2F&tag=topfivproinf-20&linkCode=ur2&camp=1789&creative=9325
